metadata.synopsis: Laezel wakes you up in the middle of the night, making it seem at first like she wants sex. Instead, she's looking for a way to convince herself that her feelings towards you are justified and you deserve them. She challenges you to single combat.If the player refuses the duel, the romance with Laezel is ended here.If the players accept, they fight in gameplay and regardless of who wins, a sex scene starts afterwards, branching depending on the outcome.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Queue Camp Night Laezel Romance 2 (to be added)- Go to bed

28.context: CinematicNodeContext: The camera shows the player sleeping. Behind them, Lae'zel's face appears, whispering into their ear.

17.speaker: Lae'zel
17.text: Don't say a word. Just listen.
17.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

30.speaker: Lae'zel
30.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

13.speaker: Lae'zel
13.text: A parasite grips my mind. My own people hunt me. But I am gnawed by an even greater torment.
13.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

8.speaker: Lae'zel
8.text: A parasite grips my mind. Kith'raki betray their own queen. But I am gnawed by an even greater torment.
8.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

47.speaker: Lae'zel
47.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

10.speaker: Lae'zel
10.text: My thoughts are hallowed ground. Yet you've crawled your way in. Uninvited.
10.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

20.speaker: Lae'zel
20.text: I am obsessed by the ground under your feet and the wind over your head. I see your face just before I sleep and after I wake.
20.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

14.speaker: Lae'zel
14.text: I ask myself: are you worthy?
14.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

27.speaker: Lae'zel
27.text: Zhak vo'n'ash duj. There is only one way for you to prove it.
27.context: NodeContext: ZHOCK VOH-nahsh DOO. (Source of my bruises.) Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

44.speaker: Player
44.text: Slaying our enemies in coldest blood?

5.speaker: Lae'zel
5.text: A fine sentiment. But I require more.

24.speaker: Lae'zel
24.text: We fight. I test you in battle.
24.context: NodeContext: In normal tone, but not aggressive.

18.speaker: Lae'zel
18.text: Dance with me. Bleed with me. Bruise me so that you might possess me.
18.context: NodeContext: In normal tone, but not aggressive.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: Let's fight. I will show you that I'm worthy of your obsession.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Ha! Prepare yourself, and prove your worth to me.

12.speaker: Lae'zel
12.text: Do it then. Make me yours.
12.context: NodeContext: Intensely but with some affection and amusement. She is fighting her lover as a test of passion.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: Sorry, but no. This is too intense for my liking.

45.speaker: Narrator
45.text: *Your parasites stir. You make a fleeting connection. You feel a single heartbeat - and the bond is nearly broken.*

32.speaker: Lae'zel
32.text: Say 'go', and I will go. And I will speak of this no longer.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: I'd rather fight. Let's see who's worthy of whom.

35.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel rises to her feet. The player rises to theirs. They enter battle stance.

11.speaker: Lae'zel
11.context: NodeContext: Intensely but with some affection and amusement. She is fighting her lover as a test of passion.

29.context: CinematicNodeContext: Lae'zel pulls away and there is only silence. The camera pulls back to reveal the player alone. Lae'zel is gone.

25.speaker: Player
25.text: Letting you always have your way?

19.speaker: Lae'zel
19.text: That is how you earn my trust. Not how you earn my flesh and spirit.

40.speaker: Player
40.text: Get out of here, Lae'zel. You're being a nuisance.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: Stay. Tell me how you to earn your mind and body.

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Sorry. Our first time was our last.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Drop this obsession. We're allies, nothing more.

26.speaker: Lae'zel
26.text: A parasite grips my mind. The shadows curse me. But I am gnawed by an even greater torment.
26.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Get the Hells out of here. I'm trying to sleep.

9.speaker: Lae'zel
9.text: So was I. But my blood runs too hot.
9.context: NodeContext: Speaking softly and slightly sexily into player's ear
